message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"that place; there","sentence":"朋友在那儿。","image_prompt":"A visual of two simple, HSK1-style cartoon friends, one standing in the foreground and pointing across a soft apocalypse landscape. In the background, the other friend is standing at a distance, showing the meaning of '那儿' (there, that place). Muted, moody colors, gentle shattered buildings, overgrown nature, soft and dreamy feeling.","sentence_translation":"My friend is there."}
